trans-unit.source: Provides an editing user interface (UI) for the column collection of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 提供用于编辑的用户界面 (UI) 的列集合<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollectionEditor"></xref> class.
Edits the specified value using the specified context descriptor and service provider.
trans-unit.target: 编辑使用指定的上下文描述符和服务提供商的指定的值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> object indicating the context of the object being edited.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref>对象，它指示正在编辑的对象的上下文。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IServiceProvider> object containing a reference to the associated designer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IServiceProvider>对象，其中包含对关联的设计器的引用。</xref:System.IServiceProvider>

trans-unit.source: The final value of the object after it has been edited.
trans-unit.target: 对象后已编辑的最终值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the editing style associated with this editor, using the specified <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取与此编辑器中，使用指定关联的编辑样式<xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> object that indicates the context of the object being edited.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref>指示正在编辑的对象的上下文的对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditorEditStyle"></xref> value representing the editing style of this editor.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditorEditStyle"> </xref>值，该值表示此编辑器的编辑样式。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_Modal" name="Modal" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_Modal" name="Modal" href=""> </xref>。
